TableSettings.uniqueName:
IdeConnections%23vhgstbclone_mimirWITH stmt_xbrl_dates AS (SELECT to_date(capital_date, 'DD.MM.YYYY') AS capital_date, to_date(htv_date, 'DD.MM.YYYY') AS htv_date FROM (SELECT cast('18-MAY-2017' as date) AS capital_date, cast('18-MAY-2017' as date) as htv_date from dual) ), stmt_sector as ( select 'S.11.RAF' as id, 'General governments' as value from dual union all select 'S.2.ERO' as id, 'General governments' as value from dual union all select 'S.11.SAG' as id, 'General governments' as value from dual union all select 'S.1311' as id, 'General governments' as value from dual union all
select 'S.122' as id, 'Credit institutions' as value from dual union all select 'S.2.ERI' as id, 'Credit institutions' as value from dual union all
select 'S.122X' as id, 'Financial corporations other than credit institutions' as value from dual union all select 'S.123' as id, 'Financial corporations other than credit institutions' as value from dual union all select 'S.124' as id, 'Financial corporations other than credit institutions' as value from dual union all select 'S.125' as id, 'Financial corporations other than credit institutions' as value from dual union all select 'S.125X' as id, 'Financial corporations other than credit institutions' as value from dual union all select 'S.126' as id, 'Financial corporations other than credit institutions' as value from dual union all select 'S.127' as id, 'Financial corporations other than credit institutions' as value from dual union all select 'S.128' as id, 'Financial corporations other than credit institutions' as value from dual union all select 'S.129' as id, 'Financial corporations other than credit institutions' as value from dual union all select 'S.2.ERF' as id, 'Financial corporations other than credit institutions' as value from dual union all select 'S.2.ERV' as id, 'Financial corporations other than credit institutions' as value from dual union all
select 'S.11.IAN' as id, 'Non-financial corporations' as value from dual union all select 'S.11.ILA' as id, 'Non-financial corporations' as value from dual union all select 'S.11.ISJ' as id, 'Non-financial corporations' as value from dual union all select 'S.11.LAB' as id, 'Non-financial corporations' as value from dual union all select 'S.11.MAN' as id, 'Non-financial corporations' as value from dual union all select 'S.11.OFL' as id, 'Non-financial corporations' as value from dual union all select 'S.11.SJA' as id, 'Non-financial corporations' as value from dual union all select 'S.11.THA' as id, 'Non-financial corporations' as value from dual union all select 'S.11.THF' as id, 'Non-financial corporations' as value from dual union all select 'S.11.THH' as id, 'Non-financial corporations' as value from dual union all select 'S.11.VEN' as id, 'Non-financial corporations' as value from dual union all select 'S.1313' as id, 'Non-financial corporations' as value from dual union all select 'S.2.ERA' as id, 'Non-financial corporations' as value from dual union all
select 'S.121' as id, 'Central banks' as value from dual union all select 'S.2.ERS' as id, 'Central banks' as value from dual union all
select 'S.14' as id, 'Households' as value from dual ),
stmt_total_reg_cap AS ( SELECT total_regulatory_capital FROM capital_info ci WHERE ci.the_date = (SELECT capital_date FROM stmt_xbrl_dates) AND ci.consolidate_parent = 'Móðurfélag' ),
stmt_main AS ( select nvl(htv.group_ssn,htv.ssn) Code, nvl(htv.group_name,htv.cust_full_name) Name, lei_code, ' ' Residence, ' ' Sector, ' ' NACE_DESC, ' ' "Type" from mimir.v_htv_report htv left join mimir.lei_code lei on nvl(htv.group_ssn,htv.ssn) = lei.ssn inner join (
select nvl(htv.group_ssn,htv.ssn) group_ssn from mimir.v_htv_report htv where the_date = (SELECT HTV_DATE FROM XBRL_DATES) group by nvl(htv.group_ssn,htv.ssn)
having sum(nvl(htv.credit_risk_exposure,0))/ ( select TOTAL_REGULATORY_CAPITAL from capital_info where the_date = (SELECT CAPITAL_DATE FROM mimir.XBRL_DATES) and consolidate_parent = 'Móðurfélag' ) >= 0.1 ) stor on nvl(htv.group_ssn,htv.ssn) = stor.group_ssn where the_date = (SELECT HTV_DATE FROM mimir.XBRL_DATES) and
nvl(htv.group_ssn,htv.ssn) <> htv.ssn group by nvl(htv.group_ssn,htv.ssn),nvl(htv.group_name,htv.cust_full_name),lei_code
having sum(nvl(htv.credit_risk_exposure,0))/ (
select TOTAL_REGULATORY_CAPITAL from capital_info where the_date = (SELECT CAPITAL_DATE FROM mimir.XBRL_DATES) and consolidate_parent = 'Móðurfélag' ) >= 0.1
UNION ALL
select htv.ssn Code, htv.cust_full_name Name, lei_code, DOMICILE_COUNTRY_CODE_2L Residence,
case when central_bank_2014 in ('S.11.RAF','S.2.ERO','S.11.SAG','S.1311') then 'General governments' when central_bank_2014 in ('S.122','S.2.ERI') then 'Credit institutions' when central_bank_2014 in ('S.122X','S.123','S.124','S.125','S.125X','S.126','S.127','S.128','S.129','S.2.ERF','S.2.ERV') then 'Financial corporations other than credit institutions' when central_bank_2014 in ('S.11.IAN','S.11.ILA','S.11.ISJ','S.11.LAB','S.11.MAN','S.11.OFL','S.11.SJA','S.11.THA','S.11.THF','S.11.THH','S.11.VEN','S.1313','S.2.ERA') then 'Non-financial corporations' when central_bank_2014 in ('S.121','S.2.ERS') then 'Central banks' when central_bank_2014 in ('S.11.RAF','S.2.ERO','S.11.SAG','S.1311') then 'General governments' when central_bank_2014 in ('S.122','S.2.ERI') then 'Credit institutions' when central_bank_2014 in ('S.122X','S.123','S.124','S.125','S.125X','S.126','S.127','S.128','S.129','S.2.ERF','S.2.ERV') then 'Financial corporations other than credit institutions' when central_bank_2014 in ('S.11.IAN','S.11.ILA','S.11.ISJ','S.11.LAB','S.11.MAN','S.11.OFL','S.11.SJA','S.11.THA','S.11.THF','S.11.THH','S.11.VEN','S.1313','S.2.ERA') then 'Non-financial corporations' when central_bank_2014 in ('S.14') then 'Households' else 'ATH' end Sector, nace.NACE_DESC, /* case when central_bank_2014 in ('S.122X','S.123','S.124','S.125','S.125X','S.126','S.127','S.128','S.129','S.2.ERF','S.2.ERV') then sector_id||substr(segment_key,0,2)||' - '||segment_name_eng when central_bank_2014 in ('S.11.IAN','S.11.ILA','S.11.ISJ','S.11.LAB','S.11.MAN','S.11.OFL','S.11.SJA','S.11.THA','S.11.THF','S.11.THH','S.11.VEN','S.1313','S.2.ERA') then sector_id||' - '||initcap(sector_name_eng) else null end NACE, */ ' ' "Type" from mimir.v_htv_report htv left join valholl.DIM_INDUSTRY_SEGMENT_A_V ind on htv.segment_id = ind.segment_id left join mimir.lei_code lei on htv.ssn = lei.ssn
left join mimir.XBRL_LE_NACE_beta nace on nace.NACE = ( case when central_bank_2014 in ('S.122X','S.123','S.124','S.125','S.125X','S.126','S.127','S.128','S.129','S.2.ERF','S.2.ERV') then sector_id||substr(ind.segment_id,0,2) when central_bank_2014 in ('S.11.IAN','S.11.ILA','S.11.ISJ','S.11.LAB','S.11.MAN','S.11.OFL','S.11.SJA','S.11.THA','S.11.THF','S.11.THH','S.11.VEN','S.1313','S.2.ERA') then sector_id else null end) inner join (
select nvl(htv.group_ssn,htv.ssn) group_ssn from v_htv_report htv where the_date = (SELECT HTV_DATE FROM XBRL_DATES) group by nvl(htv.group_ssn,htv.ssn)
having sum(nvl(htv.credit_risk_exposure,0))/ (
select TOTAL_REGULATORY_CAPITAL from capital_info where the_date = (SELECT CAPITAL_DATE FROM XBRL_DATES) and consolidate_parent = 'Móðurfélag' ) >= 0.1 ) stor on nvl(htv.group_ssn,htv.ssn) = stor.group_ssn where the_date = (SELECT HTV_DATE FROM XBRL_DATES) group by htv.ssn,htv.cust_full_name,htv.DOMICILE_COUNTRY_CODE_2L,lei_code, case when central_bank_2014 in ('S.11.RAF','S.2.ERO','S.11.SAG','S.1311') then 'General governments' when central_bank_2014 in ('S.122','S.2.ERI') then 'Credit institutions' when central_bank_2014 in ('S.122X','S.123','S.124','S.125','S.125X','S.126','S.127','S.128','S.129','S.2.ERF','S.2.ERV') then 'Financial corporations other than credit institutions' when central_bank_2014 in ('S.11.IAN','S.11.ILA','S.11.ISJ','S.11.LAB','S.11.MAN','S.11.OFL','S.11.SJA','S.11.THA','S.11.THF','S.11.THH','S.11.VEN','S.1313','S.2.ERA') then 'Non-financial corporations' when central_bank_2014 in ('S.121','S.2.ERS') then 'Central banks' when central_bank_2014 in ('S.11.RAF','S.2.ERO','S.11.SAG','S.1311') then 'General governments' when central_bank_2014 in ('S.122','S.2.ERI') then 'Credit institutions' when central_bank_2014 in ('S.122X','S.123','S.124','S.125','S.125X','S.126','S.127','S.128','S.129','S.2.ERF','S.2.ERV') then 'Financial corporations other than credit institutions' when central_bank_2014 in ('S.11.IAN','S.11.ILA','S.11.ISJ','S.11.LAB','S.11.MAN','S.11.OFL','S.11.SJA','S.11.THA','S.11.THF','S.11.THH','S.11.VEN','S.1313','S.2.ERA') then 'Non-financial corporations' when central_bank_2014 in ('S.14') then 'Households' else 'ATH' end, nace.NACE_DESC
) SELECT * FROM stmt_main
